title: I dont care whether she's balanced or not
body: Caitlyn is the most infuriating thing to play against.

replies.body: How can it possibly be infuriating to play against someone that literally gives you free cupcakes all game? I think that is worth getting caught in a net and shot a few times.
Seriously. I don't understand this. She doesn't give you PTSD like rengar....
That's because you haven't gotten trapped three times in a row by hidden cupcakes under turret yet
I play master yi so I've never felt that

If u get trapped once then shame on her, if u get trapped twice shame on you, if you get trapped 3 times fuck the peace signs load the choppa let it rain on you

Point is you should see it coming after the first time

Not in the same place--but rather one behind the other and so on.
When they're all invisible, it's kinda hard to dodge.
As much cheese as I have been eating lately I would be insulted if there wasn't any.

> [{quoted}](name=LegitBusinessman,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=2EcM8iLP,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-01-24T00:41:28.438+0000)
>
> Caitlyn is the most infuriating thing to play against _in bot lane_.

FT4U
Pretty sure Camille would take "the most infuriating" spot on the list. With that change I find the claim more agreeable.
That's YOUR opinion. If you main vayne of course you'll find cait cancer. If you main something that counters caitlyn you wouldn't.

Vayne is more infuriating than Cait. At least with a Cait the game isn't on a timer.  A game with a Vayne in it is almost already pre-determined and it makes games very boring. Past min 30+ if you haven't completely dominated her and her team by this time, she will probably win as long as you're not complete trash with her.

Perhaps, but a vayne player would find cait a lot more annoying than a draven or ashe player. Just like how a renekton main would love playing against yasuo every other game while a lux main would get cancer.

I wasn't arguing vayne is more or less annoying than caitlyn, I'm arguing how a x champion main would hate more it's counter than the person who mains the counter pick of X.
Unless of course you're a Juggernaut and can outduel her.
Whenever I play marksman I'm not bothered by Caitlyn. This is mostly because I like playing Sivir, and free mana is nice.
well lucky for you, she's not balanced
